item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: Hi! I am ast3ro. This is my blog: $ whoami ast3ro There’s no place like home: $ wheris ast3ro ~/ My background: $ history learn code hack My .plan: $ cat ~/.plan ----------------------------------------- ast3ro's .plan ----------------------------------------- * setup this blog * learn things * hack things * play CTFs
